body_html:
@vrv I got things working and am at a good rebase/pausing point.

Everything works without changing TF beyond installing more header files (simple couple lines in Bazel). Let me know what goals you have on your side. I can write documentation, examples, or just be a resource for other people trying to extend TF to new hardware. A couple pieces of interesting hardware are becoming popular/relevant: Intel Phi's, TrueNorth, SyNAPSE, etc. If people want to add these to TF, then I could help them get over the learning curve, as a community that knows how to get this done is probably better than documentation.

body:
@vrv I got things working and am at a good rebase/pausing point.

Everything works without changing TF beyond installing more header files (simple couple lines in Bazel). Let me know what goals you have on your side. I can write documentation, examples, or just be a resource for other people trying to extend TF to new hardware. A couple pieces of interesting hardware are becoming popular/relevant: Intel Phi's, TrueNorth, SyNAPSE, etc. If people want to add these to TF, then I could help them get over the learning curve, as a community that knows how to get this done is probably better than documentation.
